'''1.4.2''' is a hotfix to {{el|be}} released on May 23, 2018,<ref>{{tweet|Mega_Spud|999312985242918912|A new #Minecraft update is rolling out now, version 1.4.2.0. (The update contains fixes for a few crashes that affected some players)|May 23, 2018}}</ref> which fixes bugs.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004235051-Minecraft-1-4-2-Bedrock-|title=Minecraft - 1.4.2 (Bedrock)|date=May 23, 2018}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
* Fixed a crash that occurred when creating a world on Windows 10 Mobile devices.
* Fixed a crash that occurred when creating a world on mid-tier and low-end iOS devices.
* Fixed an issue that prevented content from being downloaded on Android devices.
* Fixed some worlds not updating properly to [[Bedrock Edition 1.4.0|1.4.0]].</onlyinclude>
